questions.question_text: "transparency" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The quality of being open and easy to understand
The speed at which decisions are made
questions.example_sentence: The new review system was designed to increase transparency in evaluations.
questions.explanation:
透明性・明確さ
意思決定の速さ
契約書
コスト削減手法

questions.question_text: "escalate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To become more serious or intense
questions.example_sentence: Managers aim to resolve issues before they escalate.
questions.explanation:
悪化する・深刻化する
承認される
突然終わる
記録される

questions.question_text: "qualitative" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Related to quality rather than quantity
questions.example_sentence: The evaluation includes qualitative feedback on communication skills.
questions.explanation:
質的な
数値のみの
財務限定
法的基準

questions.question_text: "calibration" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The process of adjusting standards for consistency
The delegation of tasks to employees
questions.example_sentence: Calibration meetings help ensure fair performance ratings.
questions.explanation:
基準調整・すり合わせ
結果発表
業務分担
手順廃止

questions.question_text: "bias" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: The revised process aims to reduce potential bias in evaluations.
questions.explanation:
偏り・先入観
改善計画
システム障害
業務増加
